Reference

All functions

CDISC_anova()

Generate ANOVA using table generator blocks

CDISC_boxplot()

tidyCDISC boxplot

CDISC_chg()

Generate change from baseline summary statistics using table generator blocks

CDISC_freq()

Generate frequency of categorical variables using table generator blocks

CDISC_mean(<ADSL>)

if ADSL supplied look for the column to take mean of and look for a grouping variable to group_by

CDISC_mean(<BDS>)

if BDS filter by paramcd and week We need to calculate the difference in N for this and report missing values from the mean if any

CDISC_mean()

Generate summary statistics using table generator blocks

CDISC_methods()

Find the proper function to apply to each statistical and column block pairing and use the metadata associated with each column block for the function's arguments

CDISC_scatterplot()

tidyCDISC scatterplot

CDISC_spaghettiplot()

tidyCDISC spaghetti plot

CapStr()

Capitalize the first letter of a string

adae

ADAE

adlbc

ADLBC

adsl

ADSL

advs

ADVS

boxPlot_srv()

Box Plot Server Function

boxPlot_ui()

Box Plot UI

build_events()

Build Events Data Frame

common_rownames()

transform the gt rownames from generics to the column name and the total N of each column

convertTGOutput()

Using the drag and drop blocks and the shiny inputs, create a dataframe of the columns and statistics to perform and add custom classes to each of the column names based on their datafile of origin

custom_class()

Create custom S3 classes for each column block based on the dataframe they came from

dropArea()

The entire drop area of the blocks, both statistical and columns

fnIndvExplVisits()

Plot Individual Explorer Visits by Param

gather_reqs()

Gather Violated Rules

gather_rules()

Gather Rules For Help UI

guide_ind_exp_events

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Events tab

guide_ind_exp_events_adv

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Events tab w/ Advanced Filtering

guide_ind_exp_events_blank

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Events tab when no Events selected

guide_ind_exp_sel

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Selecting a Patient

guide_ind_exp_sel_adv

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Selecting a Patient with Advanced Filtering

guide_ind_exp_visits

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Visits tab when ADAM selected

guide_ind_exp_visits_adlb

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Visits tab when ADLB loaded & 'dy' visit var selected

guide_ind_exp_visits_adlb_olay

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Visits tab when ADLB loaded & 'dy' visit var selected, plus overlain events selected

guide_ind_exp_visits_blank

Individual Explorer Cicerone Guide For Patient Visits tab when no ADAMs selected

guide_popex

Population Explorer Cicerone Guide

guide_popex_sel_adv

Population Explorer Cicerone Guide with Advanced Filtering

mean_summary()

the mean_summary function is used by both the basic summary statistics block and the change from baseline block

mod_dataComplyRules_server()

dataComplyRules Server Function

mod_dataComplyRules_ui()

mod_dataComply_server()

dataComply Server Function

mod_dataComply_ui()

dataComply UI Function

mod_dataUpload_server()

dataUpload Server Function stores the uploaded data as a list and is exported to be used in other modules

mod_dataUpload_ui()

The dataUpload UI provides the interface for uploading ADSL data and a table overview of the uploaded file
